TopicTitle: RSL - Real Stock Launchers dev thread

Articles.Content:
RSL - Real Stock Launchers

Looks to add into your game some Realisticly based but stockalike launchers 

To do list: 

Add an LV-T10 Engine to the Kerbus K Based on the RL-10 and Atlas V

Add an alternate Kerbus K upper stage (like ACUS or whatever it is called)

Add Kelta 2 Upper stage engine (Delta 2)

Add a Kelta 01000 (Delta 1)

Add some other launchers and bits and pieces 

Thats all for now!

Hmmm... looks cool, although it could use a little work, especially on the first image where the colors are flat, with no detail.

Also, I'm not sure blue fuel tanks are stockalike, just sayin'.

All in all, good concept, and I am looking forward to watching the development!

13 hours ago, Mrcarrot said:

Hmmm... looks cool, although it could use a little work, especially on the first image where the colors are flat, with no detail.

Also, I'm not sure blue fuel tanks are stockalike, just sayin'.

All in all, good concept, and I am looking forward to watching the development!

Thanks, i changed the textures from using thw Bumped Speular like in the pictures and changed it to Diffuse. I like to make my textures sinple because i think more is less FPS and less is more FPS

im also working on a “long kerb 7” 

also planning a Long Kerb 2 

Im changing the textures, and creating them so they are better which means that development will slow down a lot
